languages.text: "Вы насладились? Вы удивлены? Падший дракон одолел лучших воинов арены! Культ оценил это. Маражаю Эзирраешу даровано право примкнуть к Кровавым прозелитам, нашему братству чемпионов".

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Вича говорит, что всех достойных мы уже увидели

languages.text: "Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Dracon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The Cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our circle of champions."
languages.original_text: "Вы насладились? Вы удивлены? Падший дракон одолел лучших воинов арены! Культ оценил это. Маражаю Эзирраешу даровано право примкнуть к Кровавым прозелитам, нашему братству чемпионов".

traits.locale_text: "Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen draсon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezirraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our brotherhood of champions."

"Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Draсon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our brotherhood of champions."

"Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Draсon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our brotherhood of champions."

"Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Dracon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The Cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our brotherhood of champions."

"Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Dracon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The Cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our circle of champions."

languages.text: « Avez-vous apprécié le spectacle ? Cela vous surprend ? Le dracon déchu a triomphé des meilleurs guerriers de l'arène ! Le culte reconnaît sa valeur. Marazhai Aezyrraesh obtient ainsi le droit de rejoindre les rangs des Prosélytes sanglants, notre cercle de champions. »
languages.original_text: "Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Dracon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The Cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our circle of champions."

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous apprécié le spectacle ? Cela vous surprend ? Le dracon déchu a triomphé des meilleurs guerriers de l'arène ! Le culte reconnaît sa valeur. Marazhai Aezyrraesh obtient ainsi le droit de rejoindre les rangs des Prosélytes sanglants, notre cercle de champions. »

languages.text: “各位还满足吗？各位感到惊讶吗？遭到罢黜的前任裁决官，竟然打败了竞技场中最出色的战士！巫灵教派对此赞赏不已！玛拉斋·艾泽拉什得到了加入血腥叛党的权利！为我们的冠军队伍欢呼吧！”
languages.original_text: "Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Dracon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The Cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our circle of champions."

traits.locale_text: “各位还满足吗？各位感到惊讶吗？遭到罢黜的前任裁决官，竟然打败了竞技场中最出色的战士！巫灵教派对此赞赏不已！玛拉斋·艾泽拉什得到了加入血腥叛党的权利！为我们的冠军兄弟会欢呼吧！”

languages.text: 「楽しんだか？驚いたか？落ちぶれたドラコンがアリーナの最強戦士を倒したぞ！魔女団は高く評価している。マラズハイ・アエジレシュは、我らが結束せし王者『血まみれの改宗者たち』に名を連ねる権利を与えられたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Dracon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The Cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our circle of champions."

traits.locale_text: 「楽しんだか？驚いたか？落ちぶれたドラコンがアリーナの最強戦士を倒したぞ！魔女団は高く評価している。マラズハイ・アエジレシュは、我らが結束せし王者『血まみれの改宗者たち』に名を連ねる権利を与えられたんだ」

languages.text: "Habt Ihr es genossen? Seid Ihr überrascht? Der gefallene Dracon hat die stärksten Kämpfer der Arena besiegt! Der Kult weiß das zu schätzen. Marazhai Aezyrraesh hat sich das Recht verdient, sich den blutigen Bekehrten, unserem Zirkel der Champions, anzuschließen."
languages.original_text: "Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Dracon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The Cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our circle of champions."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr es genossen? Seid Ihr überrascht? Der gefallene Draсon hat die stärksten Kämpfer der Arena besiegt! Der Kult weiß das zu schätzen. Marazhai Aezyrraesh hat sich das Recht verdient, sich den blutigen Bekehrten, unserer Bruderschaft der Champions, anzuschließen."

languages.text: «¿Os habéis divertido? ¿Os habéis sorprendido? ¡El Dracón caído ha derrotado a los mejores guerreros de la arena! El Culto está complacido. Marazhai Aezyrraesh se ha ganado el derecho a unirse a los Prosélitos Ensangrentados, nuestro círculo de campeones».
languages.original_text: "Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Dracon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The Cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our circle of champions."

traits.locale_text: «¿Os habéis divertido? ¿Os habéis sorprendido? ¡El dracón caído ha derrotado a los mejores guerreros de la arena! El culto está complacido. Marazhai Aezyrraesh se ha ganado el derecho a unirse a los Prosélitos Ensangrentados, nuestra hermandad de campeones».

languages.text: "Keyif aldınız mı? Ağzınız açık kaldı mı? Yitik Drakon, arenanın en iyi dövüşçülerini biçti geçti! Tarikat, azmini takdir ediyor. Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Kızıl Zındıklar'a katılarak müdafilerimiz arasında yerini almaya hak kazandı."
languages.original_text: "Have you enjoyed it? Are you surprised? The fallen Dracon has defeated the best warriors of the arena! The Cult appreciates it. Marazhai Aezyrraesh has been granted the right to join the Bloodstained Proselytes, our circle of champions."

traits.locale_text: "Keyif aldınız mı? Ağzınız açık kaldı mı? Düşmüş Drakon, arenanın en iyi savaşçılarını biçti geçti! Tarikat, azmini takdir ediyor. Marazhai Aezyrraesh, Kızıl Zındıklar'a katılarak müdafilerimiz arasında yerini almaya hak kazandı."
